content: lubava is the textured crochet design this pattern is the written instructions using u s /american terminology and сharts you will need to work front and back post stitches clusters splits puffs all abbreviations and special stitches are explained in detail the pattern consists of 31 rounds you can use 2 or more contrasting colors total yardage for pattern between 390 400 yards using recommended thread and crochet hook #1 25 mm the finished size of the doily - approx 13-14 inches english translation provided by svetlana vyugova
